title: Colorado Department of Higher Education warns of massive data breach
description: The Colorado Department of Higher Education (CDHE) discloses a massive data breach impacting students, past students, and teachers after suffering a ransomware attack in June. [...]

title: Clop ransomware now uses torrents to leak data and evade takedowns
description: The Clop ransomware gang has once again altered extortion tactics and is now using torrents to leak data stolen in MOVEit attacks. [...]

title: New acoustic attack steals data from keystrokes with 95% accuracy
description: A team of researchers from British universities has trained a deep learning model that can steal data from keyboard keystrokes recorded using a microphone with an accuracy of 95%. [...]
